snippet: A federal advisory committee has recommended that the Centers for Disease Control and Prevention lower the threshold for diagnosing lead poisoning.
abstract: A federal advisory committee has recommended that the Centers for Disease Control and Prevention lower the threshold for diagnosing lead poisoning.
lead_paragraph: A federal advisory committee has recommended that the Centers for Disease Control and Prevention lower the threshold for diagnosing lead poisoning in children, the first recommendation of its kind in 20 years and one that would mean hundreds of thousands more kids meet the standard for lead poisoning.

headline.main: C.D.C. May Lower Threshold for Lead Poisoning

keywords.name: organizations
keywords.value: Centers for Disease Control and Prevention
